originalText.text: We were very happy with TV and Home Theater Installation New York consultation and installation of our home theater. They provided excellent service at a better price than was quoted from their competitors. We met with a few potential home theater guys and TV and Home Theater Installation was by far the best consultant for our needs. They spent quite a while working with us just to determine where our furniture and big-screen should be situated to maximize the benefits of the theater system - and that was before we hired them! They did a beautiful job hiding all of the wiring and installing the home theater system. They also patiently walked us through how to most easily use the equipment and showed us shortcuts on the computer to modify our system. We would definitely hire them again and recommend them to others.

originalText.text: Fantastic customer service and fantastic workmanship. The servicemen at TV and Home Theater Installation New York were extremely professional and the price was very reasonable. Their rep came in, consulted on the home theater installation we wanted done and figured out the way to get it done. They were back only a couple days later and were so quick with getting the work done but it was done perfectly to what we wanted. They know what they are doing and do a great job! We would recommend this NYC Company to anyone, and with their prices they’re affordable to everyone too.

originalText.text: I decided to work with TV and Home Theater Installation New York after I spoke to two other providers in NYC, both were reviewed in Google. I am glad with my decision and the installers at TV and Home Theater Installation are just superb. They came to my house 2 days after we talked on the phone, had the job done within 4 hr, and the charges was well within estimates provided on the phone. Absolutely reasonable compared to the first two I spoke to. Recommending to my friends and co-workers for TV and home theater installation.

originalText.text: I found TV and Home Theater Installation New York on Google after reading rave reviews and they have earned another one. They are the best example of a business that gets it! I called needing 2 TV's installed and in short order if possible. I was impressed they were available. They discussed options; I picked the best one to suit my needs and scheduled the install. Prior to their arriving, I headed out to buy everything I needed. They even answered questions about which TV and home theater was the best to buy when I was inside a store purchasing what was needed. They never missed a beat. The install was clean, quick and very professional. Nothing more to say other than TV and Home Theater Installation New York will be installing more equipment for me in the future without question.

originalText.text: After TV and Home Theater Installation New York saved our stereo system at work, I thought of them when my husband and I decided to finally have our plasma TV mounted on the wall. Two installers were able to come out two days after I emailed them, and once again, they went way above the call of duty. My husband and I both feel that we got more than we paid for! Highly recommended.
